text: Matam adumaktada Jisu Thawai Asengbagi mapanna haraobana thalladuna hairak-i, â€œHe Ipa, swarga malem pumnamakki Mapu Ibungo! Eina nahakpu thagatchari maramdi nahakna hiramsing asibu asingbasing amadi akhang-aheisingdagi lottuna thambiraga apikpa angangsing asida phongdokpire. Hoi, Ipa, masimak nahakki naphamdadi apenbani.
